repository.orgName: Staats- und UniversitätsBibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This manuscript consists of a commenatary on the Uttararāmāyaṇa of the Valmiki-rāmāyaṇa. It is a very abrupt commentary. The manuscript is incomplete, it ends in the with beggining of commentary on 59th Sarga of Uttararāmāyaṇa.
The front cover with title : uttararāmāyaṇavyākhyā at the centre. śrirāmā …. (Few akṣaras are covered by the shelf mark sticker.) jo ? ṇe vat rāmānujāya After the guard folio one folio half broken and edges are damaged. Some matter in Sanskrit in Grantha script. It seems to be some part of commentary.
Back side of the front cover some matter in Sanskrit and carved in Grantha script. Line 1 śrimahāgaṇapataye

msItem.title: Uttararāmāyaṇavyākhyā
msItem.incipit: ? vat prathamaṃ nāradena saṁkṣepata upadiṣṭaṃ nijayamamaprabhāvena yathā vada dṛṣṭaṃ nāma caritram śatakoṭi pravistaraguhyaṃ pratipāditaṃ
msItem.explicit:
paritatām pari
vṛtyānyatra vyāptām prasāditasyośanas sakāśādviparivṛtya jarāmanyatra saṃkramaṇa yogyām prāptassan ityarthaḥ paramikā adhikāṃ bhogatṛpyai na suptā viṣa

support.p: Broken cover. first guard leaf is supported with inserting thin palm leaves. Guard leaf and palm leaves are joined with a thread using the string whole of the palm leaf. Second guard folio also broken. Two palm leaves are glue together to strengthen the guard folio. Fragile.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 56 written folio. 1 half broken blank folio.

supportDesc.foliation:
Tamil letter numerals in the left margin. 1 -55 numbered.
is blank and unnumbered. Mansucript ends at
.
supportDesc.condition: Edges are broken of some folio.

handNote.desc: Strokes are mixed with the following letters and the sign of ṛkāra or the cluster words are manytimes mixed with the following next line. difficult to read many words.

additions.desc: Uttararāmāyaṇavyākhyā is written at the centre of the front cover.
Old shelf mark 30 in pink pencil.
Back side of the front cover some matter in Sanskrit and carved in Grantha script. Line 1 śrimahāgaṇapataye |

encodingDesc.p: ?? are used to show the unclear letters. [] is used to the letter which is speculated.

TEI.text:
vat prathamaṃ nāradena saṃkṣepata upadiṣṭaṃ nijayamamaprabhāvena yathā vada dṛṣṭaṃ nāma caritram śatakoṭi pravistaraguhyaṃ pratipāditaṃ
| paritatām pari
vṛtyānyatra vyāptām prasāditasyośanas sakāśādviparivṛtya jarāmanyatra saṃkramaṇa yogyām prāptassan ityarthaḥ paramikā adhikāṃ bhogatṛpyai na suptā vi[ṣa]
